summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackELEMIS Pro-Collagen Energizing Marine Cleanser is an energizing gel cleanser that effectively removes daily grime, makeup and impurities while leaving skin with a youthful glow.
details: DetailsBenefitsThis luxurious gel cleanser helps energize the skin for optimum performanceSupercharged with minerals Magnesium, Zinc and Copper and a trio of acids, the advanced formula leaves the complexion looking beautifully revived and rejuvenatedIt builds to a soft, rich lather to easily lift away makeup and daily grime without stripping the skin of essential moistureThe deep cleansing action helps reduce excess oil and minimizes the look of pores, for skin that feels rebalanced and invigoratedResearch Results97% agreed it helped to effectively remove daily grime and pollutants from skin*95% agreed it helped to reduce excess oil and impurities from skin*94% agreed it left skin feeling soft and smooth*90% agreed it left skin looking energized**Independent User Trials 2019. Results based on 126 people over 2 weeksKey IngredientsAnti-Ageing Acid Trio: Succinic and Lactic acid work together to help gently break down the tiny bonds between dead skin cells, whilst Ferulic acid found in Acai provides moisturisation benefits, revealing a more luminous complexionPadina Pavonica: A brown algae found on the Mediterranean coast that is known to support the feeling of hydrationItem 2570296How To UseUse every morning and evening.Step 1 - Massage a pea-sized amount into damp skin with fingertips.Step 2 - Add warm water to create a lather.Step 3 - Rinse off.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Glycerin, Sodium Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Lauryl Glucoside, Xanthan Gum, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Phenoxyethanol, Hydroxypropyl Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Chlorphenesin, Sodium Chloride, Disodium EDTA, Fragrance (Parfum), Copper PCA, Maris Sal/Sea Salt/Sel Marin, Succinic Acid, Euterpe Oleracea (Acai) Fruit Extract, Lactic Acid, Padina Pavonica Thallus Extract, Sodium Hydroxide, Zinc Gluconate, Magnesium Aspartate, Acacia Decurrens (Mimosa) Flower Extract, Rosa Centifolia Flower Extract, Linalool, Lactobacillus Ferment, Citronellol, Geraniol, Copper Gluconate, Rhizobian Gum, Sodium Hyaluronate.Please note the ingredient lists are subject to change, customers should refer to the product packaging for the correct ingredient list.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use every morning and evening.Step 1 - Massage a pea-sized amount into damp skin with fingertips.Step 2 - Add warm water to create a lather.Step 3 - Rinse off.
ingredients: Sodium Hyaluronate.Please note the ingredient lists are subject to change
customers should refer to the product packaging for the correct ingredient list

reviews.headline: Soft & clean
reviews.comments: I've been using this cleanser for 2 weeks and honestly i'm obsessed It leaves my skin super soft, clean and smooth, I've been using it daily, and I swear my skin looks more awake and clear gifted by elemis

reviews.headline: Fresh and clean
reviews.comments: Elemis Pro-Collagen Energising Marine Cleanser is like a wake-up call for your skin. The gel feels cool and soothing and turns into a gentle foam as you add water and massage the skin. It has a delicate marine scent that invigorates the senses. It removes makeup and grime easily and leaves skin feeling fresh and energized! *Gifted by Elemis

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: Complimentary from elemis. I love this cleanser. I have only used cleansing balms from Elemis but I have never tried their regular cleansers until now. I love the formula and I love that it's still hydrating while cleansing my skin nicely. It still removed makeup but I like using it for my morning skincare routine.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: Gifted by Elemis. Have been loving this cleanser so much! I've been using this in my routine daily and have seen such a difference. It's a great daily cleanser because removes daily grime, makeup and impurities whilst leaving skin with a youthful glow.

reviews.headline: Hydrating and lightweight
reviews.comments: Easy to use and not overly stripping! It comes with a pump dispenser and has a lightweight texture. There is little to not scent. It is a perfect daily cleanser and really helps to make sure my skin feels hydrated and refreshed. Gifted by Elemis.

reviews.headline: Clean!
reviews.comments: Love the texture of it. Cleans my face nicely and gives a bright look immediately. I can tell it's not completely stripping my face excessively but is enough to get the light makeup off or dirt from the usual day. Has a light scent and I love using it daily! Complimentary from Elemis

reviews.headline: Perfect cleanser for dry skin type.
reviews.comments: I received this new Pro-Collagen Energising Marine Cleanser complimentary from Elemis in exchange for my honest opinion. I have dry skin and this cleanser left my skin feeling hydrated after washing . The texture is gel like and doesn't leave your skin dry or stripped. You only need a pea size on damp skin to break up the makeup or sunscreen. Then I wash it out with warm water . All my makeup or sunscreen comes of completely. Perfect gentle cleanser for dry skin type .

reviews.headline: Works well for me
reviews.comments: This cleanser is perfect for removing dirt and makeup after a long day. It works really well and gets rid of my most stubborn makeup! It doesn't irritate my skin and leaves my face feeling clean. Gifted by elemis

reviews.headline: Feels so refreshing
reviews.comments: This gel cleanser is so refreshing! It takes off all my makeup and grime without drying me out. My skin feels clean, fresh, glowy, and just so revived like a little spa moment every day. Gifted by Elemis.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: This cleanser is so good . It cleans my face and makes my skin feel better and more relaxed . It smells so good. It doesn't make my skin feel very dry after I wash my face. I highly recommend this product. Complimentary from Elemis .

reviews.headline: Good cleanser
reviews.comments: I have combination skin and this worked decently in terms of cleansing. It smells good and is a pretty hefty sized bottle. It's moisturizing and cleans pretty well but if you have really oily skin you may want something stronger. If you have dry skin this might be a good fit.  Gifted by elemis

reviews.headline: I love the whole experience!
reviews.comments: This cleanser smells amazingâ€”super luxurious. It takes off all my makeup and leaves my skin feeling fresh and clean. The gel feels really gentle and doesn't dry me out at all. Honestly, it makes me feel like I'm treating myself at a fancy spa. I love the whole experience! Gifted by elemis

reviews.headline: Gentle!
reviews.comments: I love this cleanser! My skin leans toward dry but this gel consistency has been great for me. It does have a light scent which I personally love but I know some people are sensitive to that. Doesn't dry my skin out! Gifted by Elemis

reviews.headline: Great cleanser
reviews.comments: Gifted by Elemis. This is a gentle face wash. I have combo skin and I've been using this face wash the last week and a half . It's gentle enough to use everyday. It does not have a strong scent. It cleanses thoroughly without drying. Also the pump is the best I would love to have all my skincare in an applicator that this one has. It's very easy to pump out and quickly.

reviews.headline: EXCELLENT!
reviews.comments:
An absolute dream! I have oily skin and this cleanser does wonders for me! It makes me feel super clean, with ZERO greasiness yet it doesn't strip my skin nor makes it dry! It leathers super nice and it just gives you a fresh feeling like no other! 100% recommend!
Complimentary from Elemis

reviews.headline: Great gel face wash
reviews.comments: This is a super luxurious gel face wash that adequately removes my makeup and sunscreen without making my skin feel tight and dry. It is a nice size and lasts quite a while. A small dollop is perfect for your whole face and neck. Gifted by elemis

reviews.headline: Amazing cleanser
reviews.comments: I received this complimentary from elemis. This is a great cleanser that has a really refreshing scent to it. I enjoy all this cleanses my face and doesn't give me any kind of irritation or strip my face of it's natural oils. The texture is also very nice as well as it's not too light but well balanced. I can easily use this without any kind of complication and my skin is always left clean and feeling so soft.  Overall I definitely will continue to use this to clean my face.

reviews.headline: Great cleanser!
reviews.comments: Amazing cleanser for my combination skin! It has a lovely scent and lightweight gel texture that feel nice on my skin. It does a great job getting rid of all my makeup and grime from the day, as well as excess oils. It doesn't over dry or strip my skin, or cause any irritation at all. It makes my skin feel super soft and smooth,  and totally refreshed with a beautiful glow. I love it and will definitely keep using it everyday. I received this product complimentary from Elemis!

reviews.headline: Great cleanser
reviews.comments: I've been using this cleanser for about two weeks and the results are amazing. The gel gets deep into my pores and strips away dirt, grease and grime on any given day, perfect for those makeup days as well. This time of the year my skin is very oily, this really helped my pores and overall skin texture without stripping it or drying it out. My skin is cleaner and more balanced with a healthy glow. Gifted by elemis

reviews.headline: I really like this!
reviews.comments: I received this Pro-Collagen Energising Marine Cleanser to try out and review complimentary from Elemis Skincare in exchange for my honest opinion. So far I think that this face cleanser has been great! I have combination skin, and I like how refreshing this cleanser is and how it leaves my face feeling very clean without drying it out. I really like the scent of this cleanser as well.

media.headline: Perfect cleanser for dry skin type.
Perfect cleanser for dry skin type.
The perfect balance in a cleanser
A spa like cleanse that energizes my skin
A spa like cleanse that energizes my skin

faceoff_positive.comments: I am loving the entire Pro Collagen Marine line.  This cleanser feels wonderful and lathers beautifully allowing you to take in the gentle clean smelling aroma of the product.  A month ago my 42 year old sensitive prone to breakouts skin was looking very red, dull, and lifeless, makeup didn't really help to cover it all.  Today everyone comments on how beautiful my complexion has gotten and asks what my new secret is. It's Elemis and this go to cleanser.
faceoff_positive.headline: Smells fabulous!

faceoff_negative.comments: I only got to use a quarter of the bottle before one fall off the counter made the pump not work at all. According to their product team, there is no way to gain access to the product. Customer service would not help with anything citing the drop as it the cause. My main issue here is that I've never encountered a product I couldn't just take the lid/pump off and use the remainder. After doing further review, there are many pump complaints going back years that have nothing to do with falls. Just don't waste your money like I did.
faceoff_negative.headline: DO NOT BUY
